command.exposure.export.failure.cannot_g: Cannot get exposure IDs. No exposures are saved or some error occurred.

command.exposure.show.error.not_a_player: This command should be issued by the player.

command.exposure.show.latest.error.no_ex: No exposures have been stored in this session.
exposure.file_capture.error.casual.canno: Source at the address is protected by an unknown force.
exposure.file_capture.error.casual.file_: Address doesn't point to a source.
exposure.file_capture.error.casual.not_s: Source at the address has unknown structure and cannot be projected.
exposure.file_capture.error.casual.path_: Address is not suitable for projection.
exposure.file_capture.error.technical.ca: Cannot load from file: unable to read the file.
exposure.file_capture.error.technical.fi: Cannot load from file: file does not exist.
exposure.file_capture.error.technical.no: Cannot load from file: filepath has no extension.
Cannot load from file: image format is not supported.
exposure.file_capture.error.technical.pa: Cannot load from file: filepath is empty.
Cannot load from file: filepath is not valid.
Cannot load from file: filepath points to a directory instead of specific file
exposure.jei.info.photograph_frame: Has three sizes: 1x1, 2x2 and 3x3. Placed like a Painting, but can be placed on floors and ceilings as well. Glow Ink Sac will make it glow. Axe can be used to strip the frame, Stick will restore it. Glass Pane will make the frame invisible, Wooden Planks will restore it.
gui.exposure.album.sign.warning: Note! When you sign the album, it will no longer be editable.
gui.exposure.camera_attachments.filter.t:
Filter
§7Tints or alters the image
§8Press [§7F4§8] to toggle filter on or off
§8[§7Click§8] to see available filters
gui.exposure.camera_attachments.flash.to:
Flash
§7Illuminates small area in front of the PokéCam
 • Can be toggled §fOn§7/§fOff§7/§fAuto§7
 • When in §fAuto§7 mode - would only fire
   if light level at Camera position is below 8
gui.exposure.camera_attachments.lens.too:
Lens
§7Changes focal range
§8[§7Scroll Wheel§8] while looking through viewfinder to zoom in/out
§8[§7Click§8] to see available lenses
gui.exposure.camera_attachments.viewfind:
Viewfinder
§8Press or hold [%s§8]%s §8while looking through viewfinder to open Camera controls
